pinyin: Sai1 wa3 si1 tuo1 bo1 er3

definition: Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with
roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: In the south, the Germans captured Sevastopol.
sentences.chinese: 在南方，德國人佔領了塞瓦斯托波爾。

sentences.english: Inkerman the cave townInkerman is a small town in the countryside of Sevastopol.
sentences.chinese: 因特曼是塞瓦斯托波爾的一個鄉村小城鎮。

sentences.english: Balaclava is a remote district of Sevastopol.
sentences.chinese: 巴拉克拉瓦是塞瓦斯托波爾的一個偏遠的地區。

sentences.english: Children are playing in ruined Sevastopol, first years after the war.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們在塞瓦斯托波爾戰後的廢墟上玩耍，戰後一年。
戰艦男孩兒，塞瓦斯托波爾，1944年。

sentences.english: The battle of Sevastopol was costly for both sides.
sentences.chinese: 塞瓦斯托波爾之戰蘇德兩方付出了代價都是極高的。
